properties.value: Training Prayer will be very similar to the main game with constraints based on available prayer training altars and access to high experience bones in large quantities.

Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Prayer training

Training Prayer will be very similar to the main game with constraints based on available prayer training altars and access to high experience bones in large quantities.

Training[edit | edit source]

Method Region Notes
Limestone altar Misthalin✓ 275% Prayer experience while two incense burners are lit. Limestone may be obtained from the Silvarea Mine located East of Varrock. Requires level 64 Construction.
Chaos Temple Prayer Training Wilderness✓ 350% Prayer experience and 50% chance not to consume a bone upon offering it.
Lava Dragon Isle Wilderness✓ 400% Prayer experience when lava dragon bones are buried on Lava dragon isle.
Gilded altar Fremennik✓ 350% Prayer experience while two incense burners are lit. Requires Fremennik Region unlock to purchase marble block and gold leaf. Requires level 75 Construction.
Ectofuntus Morytania✓ 400% Prayer experience. Players must manually grind bones, which can be a slow process. Buckets of slime may be purchased from charter ships or quickly obtained via the use of Morytania legs 4.
Shades of Mort'ton (minigame) Morytania✓ Consumes logs up to magic. Cremating fiyr remains provides a base 150 Prayer experience and 607 Firemaking experience with the Morytania Elite Diary completed.

Common bone sources[edit | edit source]

  • Wyvern bones and big bones are both available in Misthalin✓
  • Dragon bones can be farmed from the following dragons:
    • Green dragons can be found in the Wilderness✓, and Kandarin✓ (if Fremennik✓ is also unlocked)
    • Blue dragons are found in the Taverley Dungeon in Asgarnia✓ and the Ogre Enclave in Kandarin✓
    • Red dragon can be found in the Brimhaven Dungeon in Karamja✓, and the Corsair Cove Dungeon under the Myths' Guild in Kandarin✓ (if Fremennik✓ is also unlocked)
    • Black dragons are found in the Taverley Dungeon in Asgarnia✓, the Evil Chicken's Lair in Misthalin✓ (if Fremennik✓ and ( Kandarin✓ or Morytania✓) is also unlocked), one in Mynydd in Tirannwn✓, the Revenant Caves in the Wilderness✓, and the Corsair Cove Dungeon in Kandarin✓ (if Fremennik✓ is also unlocked)
    • Bronze, iron, and steel dragons are found in the Brimhaven Dungeon in Karamja✓
    • Mithril dragons and Green brutal dragons are found in the upper level of the Ancient Cavern in Kandarin✓
    • Adamant and rune dragons can be found in Lithkren Vault in Misthalin✓ if Fremennik✓ is also unlocked
    • Dragon bones are also a common drop from Vorkath, Zulrah, Chaos Elemental, Cerberus, Callisto, and dragon implings
  • Lava dragon bones are dropped by Lava dragons in the Wilderness✓
  • Dagannoth bones and superior dragon bones can be farmed in Fremennik✓ from the Dagannoth Kings and Vorkath respectively

Restrictions[edit | edit source]

Certain prayers are unable to be used. Other prayers require specific regions to unlock.

Level Prayer Region Effect Drain Rate Drain Effect Note
55 Preserve N/A Boosted stats last 50% longer 1 point per 18 seconds 2 Chambers of Xeric is unavailable.
60 Chivalry Kandarin✓ Asgarnia✓ +15% Attack, +18% Strength, +20% Defence 1 point per 1.5 Seconds 24 Requires the King's ransom quest, which requires Kandarin and Asgarnia.
70 Piety Kandarin✓ Asgarnia✓ +20% Attack, +23% Strength, +25% Defence 1 point per 1.5 Seconds 24 Requires the King's ransom quest, which requires Kandarin and Asgarnia.
77 Rigour N/A +20% Ranged attack, +23% Ranged strength, +25% Defence 1 point per 1.5 Seconds 24 Chambers of Xeric is unavailable.
77 Augury N/A +25% Magical attack and defence, +25% Defence 1 point per 1.5 Seconds 24 Chambers of Xeric is unavailable.

Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Bonecrusher Morytania✓ Automatically buries bones. Requires the Morytania Hard Diary for 50% XP or the Morytania Elite Diary for 100% XP.
Holy wrench Morytania✓ Auto-unlocked with Morytania region. If players have it in their inventory when they drink a prayer potion, prayer mix, super restore potion, or sanfew serum, they will regain additional Prayer points, depending on their Prayer level.
Prayer book Morytania✓ Auto-unlocked with the Morytania region. By right clicking on it while wearing the holy or hallowed symbol, the player can use Prayer to heal poison at the cost of some prayer points (see last paragraph). Sometimes the poison will only be partially healed if you run out of prayer points.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Prayer points can be boosted above a player's Prayer level by using an ancient mace's special attack, an eldritch nightmare staff's special attack, consuming a spicy stew (yellow spice), or by praying at the Edgeville monastery altar, Nature Grotto altar, or the God Wars Dungeon altars while wearing affiliated God items. None of these boosts allow access to additional content, e.g. a player cannot boost to activate Piety.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Seller Notes
Prayer Cape Asgarnia✓ Brother Jered While equipped or in inventory, each dose of prayer potion restores 2 extra prayer points. Effect does not stack with a holy wrench or a ring of the gods (i)+.
